analysis.description:
Crowdsale.participants (/unique_contracts/0x35e76716af84a34785b5b2925ac917449df4d83e.sol#281-283) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- participate (/unique_contracts/0x35e76716af84a34785b5b2925ac917449df4d83e.sol#320-344)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.initialise (/unique_contracts/0x35e76716af84a34785b5b2925ac917449df4d83e.sol#286-310):
	External calls:
	- token.transferOwner(owner) (/unique_contracts/0x35e76716af84a34785b5b2925ac917449df4d83e.sol#300-302)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- endBlock (/unique_contracts/0x35e76716af84a34785b5b2925ac917449df4d83e.sol#303)
	- exchangeRate (/unique_contracts/0x35e76716af84a34785b5b2925ac917449df4d83e.sol#306-307)
	- initialised (/unique_contracts/0x35e76716af84a34785b5b2925ac917449df4d83e.sol#310)

	- startBlock (/unique_contracts/0x35e76716af84a34785b5b2925ac917449df4d83e.sol#302-303)
	- wallet (/unique_contracts/0x35e76716af84a34785b5b2925ac917449df4d83e.sol#302)
